problem_statement:
Server crashes by the jsonMergePatch function with crafted arguments
**Describe the bug**
Server crashes by the jsonMergePatch function with crafted arguments.
It was found by an in-development fuzzer of WINGFUZZ.

**How to reproduce**
The SQL statement to reproduce:
```sql
SELECT jsonMergePatch(REPEAT('{"c":', 100000))
```

It can be reproduced on the official docker image. (clickhouse/clickhouse-server:head (version 24.8.1.473) and clickhouse/clickhouse-server:latest (version 24.6.2.17)).

The log traced by ClickHouse Server:
```
SELECT jsonMergePatch(REPEAT('{"c":', 100000))

Query id: 3daefa2e-e928-4438-9cfb-b071f62c62ba

[1c6fc9302e45] 2024.07.28 13:04:18.577879 [ 768 ] <Fatal> BaseDaemon: ########################################
[1c6fc9302e45] 2024.07.28 13:04:18.577957 [ 768 ] <Fatal> BaseDaemon: (version 24.8.1.473 (official build), build id: AB57C74DD7456AA12E643F366E718F749FADFC24, git hash: 206a5ff4a1f09f1f4b6826de1f0b35a605697fed) (from thread 66) (query_id: 3daefa2e-e928-4438-9cfb-b071f62c62ba) (query: SELECT jsonMergePatch(REPEAT('{"c":', 100000));) Received signal Segmentation fault (11)
[1c6fc9302e45] 2024.07.28 13:04:18.577988 [ 768 ] <Fatal> BaseDaemon: Address: 0x7f3619181ff8. Access: write. Attempted access has violated the permissions assigned to the memory area.
```
